name: Pixel Futbol
description:
Win all the matches and take home the cup that evey country wants.

  • Play through 8 different levels.
  • Choose between 12 different teams, with 2 different players each one.
 Controls

Controller fully supported!

Move - WASD / Arrow keys / Joystick / D-Pad
Jump - Spacebar / Enter / A (Xbox) / X (Playstation)
Shoot - Z / B (Xbox) / O (Playstation)

 Credits

Unlostpixel - game design / coding / art & animation
Alaska / Sucurí - art & animation
Edgar Pineda “Kurtt L.” - music (Alt-Neu (Level1) and StragerGoal! (Level4))

Special thanks to  GrafxKid, essssam, Pixel Frog and  digitalmoons
